title: Airplane Management
helpText: Fill in airplane details and manage them here.
airplaneListHowToUseContent:
Fill in the airplane details below.
Tap 'Add Airplane' to create a new entry.
Tap a list item to edit it.
Press 'Update' to save changes, or 'Delete' to remove it.
Data is stored securely and remembered next time you open the app.

reservationHelpText:
This page lets you add and view flight reservations.
Fill in the fields, then tap '+' or 'Add your trip'.
Tap an item to view details, or long press to delete.
